segments.text: I can’t believe how calm everything looks outside that window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden is so tidy, but inside, it’s pure chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just drying dishes like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is spilling everywhere, and she doesn’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is about to fall, and the girl is just standing there like it’s normal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re all going to regret this in a minute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, and the water is spreading—this is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
